skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. The first hit has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 3 turns. The second hit has a 75% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 3 turns. The third hit heals this Champion by 4% of her MAX HP for every debuff on the target.
